title: bythesea
author: bythesea
content: Like the subject says I am selling Ravencoin, willing to sell certain percentage of total amount I have. If you are interested please contact me, we can do a trade via BTC, ETH or LTC.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: You can quickly sell that in exchanges where it has got tons of volumes like in Binance, Kucoin, bittrex. And these are big exchanges out there where you can deposit that and sell it so fast.For the other exchanges where it's listed, you can see them on this link: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/ravencoin/markets/Is there's something that stops you from selling that through an exchange?

comments.author: bythesea
comments.body: Hey thanks for response.I know that I can use some exchange to sell/trade. The only reason why I posted here is because I wanted to do it directly, well direct trade.Not in a hurry to do it, so I can wait few days. If no one needs it I will sell/trade using the exchange.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: bythesea on April 01, 2023, 08:22:54 AMHey thanks for response.I know that I can use some exchange to sell/trade. The only reason why I posted here is because I wanted to do it directly, well direct trade.Not in a hurry to do it, so I can wait few days. If no one needs it I will sell/trade using the exchange. Alright, I do get it. Good luck if you ever find that person willing to have a deal with you. Do not forget to make your transaction safe and by having an escrow, that's going to help both of you to do it safely.Here's a list of the Recommended bitcointalk escrow services.
